an10.108:1.1: “Tikicchaka, bhikkhave, virecanam denti pittasamutthananampi abadhanam patighataya, semhasamutthananampi abadhanam patighataya, vatasamutthananampi abadhanam patighataya.
an10.108:1.3: Tanca kho etam, bhikkhave, virecanam sampajjatipi vipajjatipi.
an10.108:2.1: Ahanca kho, bhikkhave, ariyam virecanam desessami, yam virecanam sampajjatiyeva no vipajjati, yam virecanam agamma jatidhamma satta jatiya parimuccanti, jaradhamma satta jaraya parimuccanti, maranadhamma satta maranena parimuccanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadhamma satta sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasehi parimuccanti.
an10.108:2.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an10.108:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an10.108:3.1: “Katamanca tam, bhikkhave, ariyam virecanam, yam virecanam sampajjatiyeva no vipajjati, yam virecanam agamma jatidhamma satta jatiya parimuccanti, jaradhamma satta jaraya parimuccanti, maranadhamma satta maranena parimuccanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadhamma satta sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasehi parimuccanti?
an10.108:4.2: ye ca micchaditthipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti te cassa viritta honti;
an10.108:4.3: sammaditthipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
an10.108:6.2: ye ca micchavimuttipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti te cassa viritta honti;
an10.108:6.3: sammavimuttipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
an10.108:6.4: Idam kho tam, bhikkhave, ariyam virecanam yam virecanam sampajjatiyeva no vipajjati, yam virecanam agamma jatidhamma satta jatiya parimuccanti …pe… sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasehi parimuccanti”ti.
